    • UIHyperlink

      public UIHyperlink​(int x, int y, int width, int link_size, java.lang.String href, java.lang.String text)
      Construct a new DocumentCell
      Parameters:
      x - : x position on the window
      y - : y position of the window
      width - : the width of this UIHyperlink
      link_size - : The height of this UIHyperlink
      href - : The value of the href attribute of this UIHyperlink

  • Method Details

    • Render

      public void Render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Renders the link onto the window. -> Update information about the dimensions of the string -> Set the color -> Underline the text -> Draw the href on the window
      Overrides:
      Render in class DocumentCell
      Parameters:
      g - : The graphics that will be updated

    • getHandleMouse

      public java.lang.String getHandleMouse​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount, int button, int modifier)
      Input: a mouse click Output: String -> The method only checks if the click was on itself, other checks have been done upstream -> Returns the href if this UIHyperlink was pressed, else "".
      Overrides:
      getHandleMouse in class DocumentCell
      Parameters:
      id - : The type of mouse action
      x - : The x coordinate of the mouse action.
      y - : The y coordinate of the mouse action.
      clickCount - : The number of times the mouse has clicked.
      button - : The mouse button that was clicked.
      modifier - : Possible other keys that were pressed during this mouse action.
      Returns:
      string: href attribute of this UIHyperlink object iff this UIHyperlink object was clicked

    • getMaxHeight

      public int getMaxHeight()
      Returns the max height of this UIHyperlink, which is the width of the string.
